metadata.title: CVE-2021-20234 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An uncontrolled resource consumption (memory leak) flaw was found in theZeroMQ client in versions before 4.3.3 in src/pipe.cpp. This issue causes aclient that connects to multiple malicious or compromised servers to crash.The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: zeromq3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
